defaultHabit1Text: Productive Wark (Click the pincil tae eedit)
defaultHabit1Notes: Saumple Guid Habits: + Eat a vegetable + 15 meenits productive wark
defaultHabit2Text: Eat Junk Fuid (Click the pincil tae eedit)
defaultHabit3Text: Tak the Stairts/Lift (Click the pincil tae eedit)
defaultHabit3Notes: Saumple Guid or Bad Habits: +/- Teuk Stairts/Lift ; +/- Drank Water/Soda
defaultHabit4Notes: Aither a Habit, a Daily or a Tae-Dae
defaultHabit5Text: Tap here tae eedit this intae a baud habit ye'd like tae quat
defaultHabit5Notes: Or delete frae the eddit scrteen
defaultDaily1Text: Use Habitica tae keep track o yer tasks
defaultTodoNotes: Ye can either feenish this Tae-Dae, or remuive it.
defaultTodo2Notes: Veesit aw the section o the bottom baur
defaultReward1Notes: Custom rewairds can come in mony forms. Some fowk will haud aff watchin thair favourite shaw unless thay hiv the gowd tae pey for it.
defaultReward2Notes: Watch TV, play a gemme, eat a treat, it's up tae yersel!
